text:
Ro: Hey guys, it’s Ro! Welcome to another
Nerdy Nummies! Today I have a special

Ro: guest, WoWCrendor! Crendor: Hey, how’s
it going?

Ro: He has an awesome WoW YouTube channel,
so I’ll put a link down below so…

Crendor: I mean… Ro: You can go check it
out.

Crendor: Awesome is an overstatement… I would
probably say mediocre... At best....

Ro: No, it’s awesome! And he also does a
podcast with Jesse Cox, called Cox and

Ro: Crendor in the morning, and they upload
it really early, but I’ll also put
Ro: a link down to that.

Crendor: Also mediocre at best. I would just…
Just don’t go there!

Ro: Don’t list… Don’t listen to him,
it’s really good, and I like it!

Ro: And, in honor of WoW, we are gonna be
making Hearthstone Chocolate Caramel

Ro: Candies today! Crendor: I’m excited!
Ro: Yeah, I’ve never done something WoW.

Crendor: I’ve always, I’ve always wanted
to make Hearthstone, just anything.

Ro: We’re gonna do it. Crendor: Because
it takes me home. Ro: Takes you home.

Crendor: Takes you home! Ro: Yeah, let’s
get started!

Ro: The things you will need, will be: White
cookie frosting, my favorite

Ro: brand is Betty Crocker… Crendor: Mmmhmmm.
Ro: Sky blue food coloring, because

Ro: we will be dying our icing. Crendor: Of
course. Ro: Then you will need black

Ro: food coloring, but this is very special
food coloring, this is oil based,

Ro: and you’ll need this because we’ll
be dying the chocolates a light gray.

Crendor: Yeah, do not get the non-special
kind! Ro: No! Or you… They’ll look like

Ro: mashed potatoes… It’s a really bad
situation.

Crendor: Yeah, unless you like mashed potatoes,
then go for it!

Ro: Then you can have mashed potato Hearthstone.
Crendor: Yeah…
Ro: Caramel candies. Crendor: Not Caramel. Ro: Not Caramel.

Ro: I learned, I learned today that
the fancy way to say it is caramel.
Crendor: Caramel!
Ro: And 2 squeeze-y bottles.

Crendor: You will also need; paint brushes
of any size, uh, you know just pick

Crendor: whichever size is best for you. Ro:
Yeah, little guys!

Crendor: Uh, this chocolate oval mold, for
your hearthstone shapes, which you

Crendor: can get at your craft store, or mold
store, whichever one you want to go to.

Ro: Any cake store, I’ll put a link down
below too so that if you want to find it
Ro: online you can buy it there.

Crendor: Your white chocolate chip things,
that you can also get at Michaels or your
Crendor: local craft store.

Ro: Yeah, these come in all different colors,
so you just want to get them in white.

Ro: White chocolate melts! Let’s put it
all together!
Crendor: Yeah! Ro: Ugh! Crendor: Yeaggghhhh!

Ro: So we’ve just microwaved all of the
white chocolate melts in this bowl,

Ro: and look at that, so nice! And now we’re
gonna add a little bit of black

Ro: food coloring, and remember, it’s oil
based! Do not add regular food coloring!

Ro: Oil based! So do you want to put in…
Crendor: Alright, did we shake well?

Ro: Uh-oh, you better shake that well. Crendor:
Alright. Ro: Put that cap on,

Ro: Shake that well. Wow, wow, wow, wow, wow!
Crendor: Alright. Ro: There we go!

Ro: So the ratio that you'd want to use is 1
bag of white candy melts, to 5 drops?

Crendor: 5 drops. Ro: 5 drops of this oil
based black… Coloring.

Ro: Now we have melted all of our chocolates
and we put it into this squeeze-y

Ro: bottle, and now we’re going to pour
it into the tray, 1/2 way.
Crendor: 1/2 way. Ro: 1/2 way full!
Crendor: So let’s begin!

Ro: Once the trays are filled 1/2 way with
chocolate, you’re gonna take your little
Ro: paintbrushes, da-dew! yay! Crendor: Yeah!

Ro: And you’re just gonna paint up the sides,
of the mold, like so.

Crendor: So, we just filled these up 1/2 way,
and we’re now going to put them
Crendor: in the freezer for 10 minutes.

Ro: And then we will add caramel, mmmmmm!
Crendor: Caramel! Ro: Caramel!

Ro: Once your little molds are all frozen,
take them out of the freezer, and now

Ro: we’re gonna work with the carmel…
Caramel! Crendor: Caramel!

Ro: So make sure you unwrap all of these little
candies, and then put them

Ro: in the squeeze bottle, and then microwave
them, and then we’re gonna fill ‘em!

Ro: Pew, pew, pew! Crendor: Drip that caramel
sauce!

Ro: Yeah! And then cover it again with 1 layer
of chocolate.
Ro: Yum! Crendor: Yum!

Ro: After the chocolate’s cooled, you put
the final layer of chocolate on,

Ro: you put it in the freezer for about 10
minutes. We’re gonna pop these

Ro: little guys out. Crendor: Alright. Ro:
Are you ready? Crendor: I’m ready!

Ro: OK, so, they’re kind of bendy, so you
can just kind of go like this…

Ro: Pewm! Crendor: Oh yeah, they’re like
ice cubes.
Ro: Yeah, like little ice cubes.

Ro: This is the only time when you’re working
with chocolate melts that if you

Ro; get these little air bubbles, that’s
a good thing! Because the more air bubbles

Ro: that you get, the better! The more it
will look like a stone.

Crendor: Oh yeah! Ro: Yeah! Crendor: Wonderful.
Ro: So we want the air bubbles

Ro: on this 1. Crendor: So if you mess up
you can feel good about it!

Ro: So what we’re gonna do to make them
look a little bit more like stones, because

Ro: these are really, really smooth. We’re
just gonna take butter knives, ba-da!

Ro: Are you ready for this? Crendor: I’m
ready! Ro: OK, and then just kind of carve

Ro: on the outsides. And you’re gonna be
using the dull edge you don’t want the
Ro: serrated edge, no, no, no!

Ro: Ta-der! Our chocolate caramel Hearthstones
are all carved out, they look so cool,

Ro: they look like stones. Crendor: They do!
Ro: Yeah!
Crendor: They look a lot like stones actually,

Crendor: I didn’t think they’d turn out
that well.

Ro: They look so cute, I love ‘em. Now we
are gonna do the last, final step,

Ro: here we are! Crendor: Yeah! Ro: Our blue
cookie frosting, and remember

Ro: this is cookie frosting, or cookie icing,
and we just dyed it blue with the

Ro: food coloring dye. So now we’re gonna
draw on top of ‘em!

Ro: Ta-da! We did it! Here are all the Caramel
filled Chocolate Hearthstones,

Ro: they’re so cute. Crendor: Caramel. Ro:
Caramel filled Hearthstones.

Crendor: Caramel, you’ll get it right 1
day. Ro: Maybe, maybe not!

Crendor: But you can believe. Ro: They’re
so cute! Eric’s is actually my favorite.

Crendor: That 1. Ro You have to hold up the
1!

Crendor: There it is. Ro: It’s perfect,
I love it!

Crendor: It was messed up, and then we took
a toothpick to it, and now it is perfect.

Crendor: Just like life, you gotta take toothpicks
to your problems!
Crendor: And that will fix everything…

Ro: I got so many requests to do something
WoW related, and I finally got to do it.

Ro: This is the first time that it’s ever
happened, and it couldn’t have been more
Ro: perfect guest, so thank you, thank you.

Crendor: Your privilege! I’m honored. Ro:
Oh, oh, oh! Why thank you!

Ro: I’ll put all of his links down below,
to his awesome podcast and his WoW

Ro: gaming channel. Crendor: They’re alright.
Ro: So go check him out!

Ro: He’s pretty cool! And he has 1 of the
most sultry voices around…
Crendor: I do…

Crendor: If you want to listen to my videos
just to fall asleep, that’s what a lot

Crendor: of people do. Ro: It’s amazing.
Crendor: Mmhmm…

Ro: I love it! So thank you again for being here.
And, if you have any other ideas for

Ro: any other Nerdy Nummies, please let me
know, leave me a comment down below
Ro: and I will do my best to make them happen!
Ro: OK, thanks you guys, bye-bye!

Crendor: Oh, oh no! Ro: That’s OK, that’s
OK, that’s OK, I’ll eat it, I’ll eat it!

Crendor: That seems like a bad idea! Ro: Ah,
ah, ah! It is hot!
Ro: Ow it is hot, why would I do that!?!?!

Ro: Why would I do that!?!? Why would I do
that!?!? Why would I do that!?!?
Ro: Oh I’m so fat! A-ha-ha-ha-ha!
